title: Expert paper II - Offshore TSO Collaboration
author: Elia Group Follow this publisher
text: At Elia, we believe in international cooperation to support the realization of Europeâ€™s Green Deal ambitions. Therefore, we have developed with 8 other TSOs within the Offshore TSO Collaboration (OTC) Program, a second Paper ahead of the High-Level offshore event of the Belgian Presidency, organized in Bruges on the 15th of May. Discover now our grid map in the North Sea and recommendations for cost allocation and financing, market design and supply chain.
